head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VREELAND, COLETTE MARIE. (NEE PRICE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VREELAND, COLETTE MARIE. (NEE PRICE)

block.p: VREELAND-Colette Marie. (nee Price). June 5, 2000. Retired resident dress buyer. Beloved mother, grandmother, sister. Rosary recited after Mass, Wednesday, June 7, 5:10 PM. Memorial Mass Saturday, June 10, 11:00 AM, Church of Our Saviour, 59 Park Avenue. In lieu of flowers donations to American Cancer Society will be appreciated. Rest in peace. We will never forget you... June, Nancy, Sis, Laura, Lukas & Kevin
